name: Mandelbrot Beauty
description:
Have you ever heard of Fractals and the Mandelbrot Set? It is a beautiful shape, purely made by math formulas. In this application you can zoom into the shape quite a bit, change colors, make screenshots and while doing that listen to some great music tracks.

Screenshots are found in the same direction you start the.exe from.

Have fun!

Right now my company bonogames develops a pretty large VR project that gives people the possibility to see through the eyes of a visually impaired person (VIP). Donations for Mandelbrot Beauty go directly into development of the VIP Simulator.
